author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Heat a wok until hot and add the oil. Add all the spices and the ginger and stir-fry for one minute until fragrant.  Add the potatoes and stir to coat in the spices.  Add the stock and bring to a gentle simmer. Simmer for 10-15 minutes until the potatoes are tender. Stir in the tomatoes and coriander. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and serve.
ingredients: 3 tbsp sunflower oil,  1 tsp mustard seeds,  Â½ tsp ground cumin,  1 tsp turmeric,  1 tsp ground coriander,  1 tsp garam masala,  1 tsp chili powder,  5cm/2in piece fresh ginger, grated,  1kg/2lb 3oz potatoes, peeled, and cut into smallish cubes,  350ml/12fl oz vegetable stock,  4 tomatoes, roughly chopped,  1 bunch coriander, roughly chopped
